item.title: Wat-er Race!
item.author: Alix Vermeulen,
item.description: On Saturday 2nd February, at 5:45am, 50 brave ICXC runners boarded the coach, ready to set off and compete in the BUCS Cross-Country Championships hosted by the University of Exeter. At 6:06am, a not-so-brave ICXC over-sleeper arrived and the club was finally able to depart. After another 3 solid â€¦
